title: HTML Page Title
gp1: Every web page should have a page title to describe the meaning of the page.
gp2: The <title> element adds a title to your page:
gp3: The title should describe the content and the meaning of the page.
wp1: The page title is very important for search engine optimization (SEO). The text is used by search engine algorithms to decide the order when listing pages in search results.
wp2: The <title> element defines a title in the browser toolbar
wp3: The <title> element provides a title for the page when it is added to favorites
wp4: The <title> element displays a title for the page in search engine-results
wp5: So, try to make the title as accurate and meaningful as possible!
example:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>HTML Tutorial</title>
</head>
<body>


The content of the document......


</body>
</html>
